projects.title: Google Clone
projects.category: Google Clone built ReactJS. Used google api key with day limit of 100 hits. React context-api and hooks are used for state management. firebase is used for deployment.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.category: Netflix Clone built with ReactJS. Used TMDB api key to fetch the movie list and genre. React context-api and hooks are used for state management. React-youtube and movie trailer dependencies are used for playing the trailers. firebase is used for deployment.
